title: Inside this Issue
summary: The newsletter covers updates on emission caps for public agencies, the impact of Tax Increment Financing (TIF) on fire departments, a legal case regarding First Amendment rights in social media, an analysis of an eminent domain case with equitable distribution, a minimum wage increase, and new cannabis use policies affecting public employers.
compressed_content: Emission caps increase for public agencies. TIF impact on fire departments and revenue analysis. Case on First Amendment rights for public officials in social media. Eminent domain case with equitable distribution of compensation. Minimum wage update to $16.28 per hour. Cannabis use policy affecting public employer hiring.
